reviewText: When I saw Roommates on tv a long time ago, I loved it!  Well I was so happy to see this on DVD and so economical I ordered it.  After I popped it in the player, it was like a different movie with all the vulgarity, and some lines/scenes I don't remember making it to tv...that I just couldn't take them swearing and using the LORD's name in vain over and over.  I was so disgusted I took it out and threw it away, so I have no idea how the other 2 movies were....Wish I could order edited DVDs....Such a shame.
summary: Too much filthy language....review for Roommates only...

reviewText: I really enjoyed all three movies on this DVD. I had never heard of Roommates, but I enjoyed it as much as Stella and The Doctor. If a movie can make me cry, that's a good movie. Stella fits the bill for that one. The Doctor is an enjoyable movie, humorous and sad all at the same time. Roommates turned out to be humorous, sad and made me cry. I'm so glad I bought this DVD.

reviewText: Havent seen Roomates yet so no-comment on that one. But, The Doctor should be required viewing for any Doctor who needs to understand -what it is to be a patient. I think there are too many Doc's out there that need a serious course in bedside manners.  Stella is a great movie, Bette Midler always portrays believable characters.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I had not seen Stella in many years and was anxious to see it again....It is a typical portrait of how selfish kids are, as to never thinking of their Parents....The kid gets grown..walks away..no matter how bad their Parents are, or get to be..they could care less..never offer to help in little ways...or even offer to let The Parent live with them...A Parent gives up waht they want to raise this kid..sacrificing..worrying...taking care of it when it is sick....but The Parent gets no help back from The Kid when they are in need...I am a person who has been ill many years and would so love someone to do small things for me like cut my toenails...rub lotion on my back...vacumn my room for me...but i get no offers of that from my two kids and struggle to do the best i can.....The Doctor, is a movie all Doctors should watch..so they realize there is a person..not just money connected to the people they see..Most Doctors are cruel and unfeeling..could care less about people..just want to line their pockets...The roommates is a really good movie..sorta sad,,, but an excellent story.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I have been looking for "The Doctor" movie for a long time. It's apparently rare, the cheapest I could find it was around $60, too much to spend on a movie. Came across this combo deal for under $10. I wish all doctors had to watch this movie. It might change the way a lot of them treat their patients.
